name: linux_process_open_sockets
pattern: {"query": "select DISTINCT p.name, p.path, pos.remote_address, pos.remote_port from process_open_sockets pos LEFT JOIN processes p ON pos.pid = p.pid WHERE pos.remote_port != 0 AND p.name != '';", "interval": 3600, "description": "Returns the network connections from system processes - ATT&CK T1108,T1100,T1102,T1105,T1039,T1029,T1011,T1041,T1043,T1090,T1094,T1048,T1132,T1020,T1065,T1001,T1071,T1219,T1104,T1008", "removed": false}
